detail_desc: Long mesh skirt with embroidery, wide elastication at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey underskirt.
Shorts in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined wrapover hood and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Detachable, braided belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with twisted side seams and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with wide elastication at the waist, a detachable tie belt and fake fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide legs.

Warm-lined boots in fabric and imitation leather with waterproof feet sections. Padded shaft with an imitation leather appliqué, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen, a stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Pockets in the side seams, one inner pocket with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck, wide ties that cross at the front and tie at the back, long gathered sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Set with a bodysuit in jersey and trousers in velour made from an organic cotton blend. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a collar, shirt front, sewn-on bow tie, button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in imitation leather with decorative seams, a zip at the back and a raw-edge hem.
Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave with a lined, detachable hood and a zip down the front. Adjustable elasticated waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Fabric-covered Alice band decorated with a metal chain.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved satin shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves with grosgrain trims down the sides. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with embroidery front and back, a low crotch and zip fly. The jeans are in a relaxed fit at the top with tapered legs and raw-edge hems.
Fitted top in cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, and elbow-length sleeves.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Fitted T-shirt in wool jersey with flatlock seams at the front, a ribbed neckline and a rounded hem.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with pin-tucks at the top, a gathered yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
Straight-style jumper in washed, rib-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Puffer gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and smocking at the sides. Lined.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, and covered elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reflective details. Fleece lining. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wrapover blouse in woven fabric with long, tapered puff sleeves. Deep V-neck, a concealed press-stud at one side and wide ties at the waist.
Jumper knitted in a merino wool and cashmere blend with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves with elbow patches, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Round-necked T-shirt in airy linen jersey.

Outdoor trousers in slightly stretchy fabric with sections in water-repellent functional fabric. Elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a drawstring at the hems. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and skinny legs with sewn-in pleats down the sides.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cotton jersey briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short satin dress with wide shoulder straps, a wide double flounce at the top and gentle flare to the hem. Lined.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Tie-hem shirt in airy linen with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Short-sleeved boiler suit in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, a V-neck and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a round neck and gathered side seams for optimum comfort over the tummy.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs down the front and short sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Short skirt in a soft weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Short skirt in a textured weave with pile details. Zip in one side. Unlined.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication, scalloped foot strap and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details and embroidery. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a frill trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Parka in a patterned cotton weave with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, flap side pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in a crinkled organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and shoulder straps with adjustable buttoning. Elastication at the back of the waist and at the hems. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a small, sewn-on fabric label at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports vest top in burnout-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with sheer sections. Loose fit.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, drawstring at the front and short sleeves. Seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake front pockets with zips.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar, small embroidery detail on the chest, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in patterned satin with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a pleated, asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Tunic in pleated, patterned jersey. Short sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked hem.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.
Mesh court shoes with pointed toes and an elasticated top edge. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a pair of mittens and a hat with earflaps in a fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, ties under the chin and a fleece lining. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Imitation leather trainers with decorative metal studs, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.
All-in-one suit in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Yoke with lace and pin-tucks at the front and gathers at the back, and a rounded hem.
Short elasticated plastic necklaces.
Bucket hat in supersoft faux fur with a quilted, lightly padded lining and a double-layered brim. Width of brim 8 cm.
